scripts.kubectl:apply: kubectl apply -f unicorn-signaling-server-deployment.yaml && kubectl apply -f unicorn-signaling-server-service.yaml
scripts.gcloud:deploy: gcloud run deploy unicorn-signaling-server --image gcr.io/unicorn-hal/unicorn-signaling-server --platform managed --region asia-northeast1 --allow-unauthenticated
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run docker:build:cloud && npm run docker:push && npm run gcloud:deploy
